definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: This shows the ESR technique may be applied to glacial till dating.
sentences.chinese: 說明冰磧物可以用ESR技術進行測年。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with moraine.
The surface material consists of drift.
sentences.chinese: 表層介質是冰磧組成的。

sentences.english: These ridges formed by glaciers or lava flows are called moraines.
sentences.chinese: 由冰川和熔岩形成的側脊叫冰磧。

sentences.english: The surface material consists of drift .
sentences.chinese: 表層介質是冰磧組成的。

sentences.english: In addition, several moraine banks are discovered around the Mount Harding.
sentences.chinese: 另外在哈丁山附近又發現了幾處冰磧堤。
